name: lamewad

Never mind.
God, I am slow.

name: rowboat
text: If anyone else here is like me at all, your avatar alone will save you from many lames, in spite of a question like that.

text: This is extremely true.

name: rowboat
text: Again, let me state that when I made that comment two months ago, I had no idea that this avatar was from a television show which I do not like. I thought it was just a tall-ass doctor.
